titleStmt.title: Victory over death a sermon preached at Steeple-Ashton in the county of Wilts, upon the 17th day of April, 1676, at the funeral of Mr. Peter Adams, the late reverend, pious, and industrious minister of Gods word there, sometime fellow of University Colledge in Oxford / by Paul Latham ...
titleStmt.author: Lathom, Paul.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.C. for Edward Gellibrand ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
